DESCRIPTION: Your total hand is your hand plus your Overdraw.

At the start of each turn, draw 1 extra card for each Speed and gain negative effects based on your Speed. NL 3+: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL 5+: Lose 2 Dexterity this turn only. NL 7+: Lose 2 Traction this turn only.
Draw 1 less card at the start of your next turn for each Brake.

At the end of the turn, gain Block and deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP equal to your Drift. When you gain Drift, gain 1 Momentum (Max 2.) At the end of the turn, lose half your Drift if you have Momentum, and all of it if you don't.
If you hand is not full, you lose 1 Overdraw and draw 1 card until it is.
When you gain Drift, gain 1 extra for each Traction.
Gain 2 Strength. Lose 2 Dexterity. Gain 1 speed.
Gain 10 Block. Gain 2 Dexterity. Lose 2 Strength. Lose 1 Speed.
Gain Block and deal damage to the lowest HP enemy equal to your Drift.
